title: Grid Points in a Triangle
text: How many points (x, y) with non-negative integer coordinates satisfy y ≤ ax / b and x ≤ n?InputThe first line contains an integer T (T ≤ 100000). T lines follow, each contains three positive integers n, a, b, where n, a, b ≤ 109and a ≤ b.OutputT lines, each contains a single integer denoting to the number of points according to the description.ExampleInput:58 2 108 4 47 1 5713241932 127894722 957823358759096725 496666160 980149020Output:13451133963383064794976145994569610845896Warning: enormous input/output data, be careful with certain languages
